title: Fragment, 15th–17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic, linen
Technique: complementary weft 2/1 twill
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivés y Escudero
description: Eight-pointed star made by interlaced squares on a beige and bronze background. Fleur de lis at star points and flower at center.
